#!/usr/bin/env python
import sys

def maxCount(A):
    cnts = {}
    for a in A:
        if a in cnts:
            cnts[a] += 1
        else:
            cnts[a] = 1

    cnt = 0
    val = 0
    for (k, v) in cnts.iteritems():
        if v > cnt:
            cnt = v
            val = k
        elif v == cnt and val > k:
            val = k
    return "%d %d" % (val, cnt)

T = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
for t in range(0, T):
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    A = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')]
    print maxCount(A)
